algorithm_technique: Greedy replacement of '?' characters in a 12-hour format time string.
problem_summary_simple: Find the latest valid 12-hour time by replacing '?' in a 'HH:MM' string.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily fill '?' in 'HH:MM' string to maximize time, respecting 12-hour format (00-11 for HH).
key_insights: Similar to the 24-hour version, a greedy approach works by filling '?' from left to right.
The 12-hour format has a specific constraint for the hour part (00-11).
The latest possible hour is 11, and the latest possible minute is 59.
